CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cells with a device configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al were fabricated and characterized under the illumination of AM1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Polymer
2. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
3. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
4. PSS (Poly(styrene sulfonate))
5. PC71BM (Poly[71-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester])
6. LiF (Lithium Fluoride)
7. Al (Aluminum)

Let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like me to identify any other entities in the paragraph!
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. Polymer
2. PC71BM
3. LiF
4. Al

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cells with a device configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al were fabricated and characterized under the illumination of AM1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's break down the paragraph and identify the "Property Value" entities:

1. Polymer solar cells: This is a type of solar cell that uses a polymer as the light-absorbing material.
2. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide): This is a conductive material used as the electrode in the solar cell.
3. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)): This is another conductive material used as the electrode in the solar cell.
4. PSS (Poly(styrene-co-vinyl alcohol)): This is a polymer used as the binder in the solar cell.
5. PC71BM (Poly[7,7'-bis(10-hydroxyjaphthalene)-2,9-diyl]-4,4'-diamine): This is a polymer used as the charge-carrying material in the solar cell.
6. LiF (Lithium Fluoride): This is a material used as a buffer layer in the solar cell.
7. Al (Aluminum): This is a material used as the electrode in the solar cell.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* 100 mW/cm^2 (the intensity of the light used to illuminate the solar cell)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. 100 mW/cm^2 (the intensity of the light used to illuminate the solar cell)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 100 mW/cm^2 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
